titleStmt.title: The single songs in the new opera, call'd The world in the moon. Sett by Mr. Daniel Purcell, and Mr. Clark
titleStmt.author: Purcell, Daniel, 1660?-1717.
Clarke, Jeremiah, 1669?-1707. aut
Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724. World in the moon. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Heptinstall, for Henry Playford at his shop in the Temple Change Fleetstreet, where also may be had a general catalogue of all the musick-books for this thirty years last past down to this present time,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement at foot of final page.
At foot of title page: Prince six pence.
